instructions:
In a large non-stick frying pan melt butter and sauté apple slices over med-low heat until almost tender,
about 5 minutes. Mix cinnamon with all-spice and brown sugar and sprinkle around the apple slices. Add
the remaining orange juice and continue sautéing in syrup for 2 to 3 minutes to desired tenderness.
ingredients: 2 tbsp orange juice, set aside in a flat bowl
1 large golden delicious apple, peeled, cored, cut in 6-8 slices and dipped in orange juice
name: Sauteed Apple Slices
